column5: there's a good chance you could be sleddin' in May too  I think a GoPro would be a good gift for you on the next occasion  looks like a fun time
Good video. But I already summerized my sled.
there's a good chance you could sleddin' in May too  I think a GoPro would be a good gift for you on the next occasion  looks like a fun time  That was shot with a Gopro.
Where's the helmet cam?  Its coming out tomorrow when i head thru the bush to get to a walleye lake in the afternoon.
post it, lookin' forward to it
Is that a GTX/GSX?  How do you like it in the tight bush trails?  I'm going for a ride shortly...still lots of snow but it's starting to get a wee bit soft around here
